long_description: A hardtail mountain bike that easily handles flowing singletrack, the Cannondale Trail 5 combines a shock-absorbent front fork, Shimano components and a strong aluminum frame for reliable performance. 6061 aluminum frame features strength-optimizing, butted tubes and shaped chainstays and seatstays to improve efficiency and comfort. SR Suntour XCM-HLO suspension fork delivers 100mm of travel with hydraulic lockout. Shimano Altus shifters and front derailleur are paired with an Acera rear derailleur to shift snappily through the 24-gear drivetrain, which is powered by Shimano cranks. Cannondale mechanical disc brakes use 160mm rotors to provide powerful braking. Stout, double-walled Alex rims are outfitted with Kenda Small Block 6 tires to provide grippy, fast-rolling performance. Specs on the Cannondale Trail 5 hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
